name: Thin Curved Two Finger Ring
description:
Thin Curved Two Finger Ring
From the Simple Circle Series
- A simple, lovely versatile two finger ring. 
- Made for a Ring & Middle fingers and is curved to fit the hand. Ergonomic!

M A T E R I A L S 
- Made of recycled sterling silver.

Ordering and Sizes
- Please send your ring sizes in the 'message to seller' at checkout. 
- Comes in sizes 4-8 US, including half sizes.  Don't see your size combo listed?   Pick 'other' and send your size in the message to seller through PayPal.

International Sizing?
- Yes of course! I can help you translate the sizing system in your country to ours- just ask. 

Completion Times- can be finished in a few days to a week.

S H I P P I N G
- Canada (Light packet, a few days to a couple weeks)
- US & Internationally (Light Packet- takes 1-2 weeks but can take longer for some countries).

options.name: other- send size w/message through PayPal.

name: Bubble Lace Ring 2
description:
Reserved for Ivy- made to order

ABOUT Bubble Lace Ring 2
- I started the Bubble Lace Series around 2000 & have recently rediscovered it. One of it's virtues is it's lightness. The open space make even large pieces surprisingly comfortable and airy. 

MATERIALS 
- Handmade from recycled sterling silver.

Completion Times
- Can be made to order in 1 to 2 weeks. Need it faster? Feel free to ask.

SHIPPING
Free unisured shipping.
- Canada (Light packet, a few days to a couple weeks)
- US & Internationally (Light Packet- takes 1-2 weeks but can take longer for some countries).

For an upgrade to insured shipping it's $3 more.

name: Floating Saucer Ring 1- Made to Order in your size
description:
Floating Saucer Ring 
- One of the virtues of this ring is it's surprising comfort! Because it can be lightly adjusted this series is also perfect for people who have bigger knuckles than 'finger'. Great for Summer/Winter & monthly size fluctuations. A ring that will always fit!
- Original design first made in 2002.
- Ring is a bit shinier then it looks in the picture- but is equally lovely.

ABOUT
- Hand made of sterling silver
- Saucers measurements are 9 mm and 6 mm = 0.9 cm and 0.6 cm = 1/4" by 3/8"

 My Floating Saucer Series Published in May '06 in Joanna Gollbergs' "The Art and Craft of Making Jewelry" by Lark Books.

Sizes 
- Can be made in sizes 4 to 12 US/Canadian sizing- If your size isn't listed please feel free to contact me to for a custom order.   I can convert international sizes- just message me with your info.

Completion Times
- Can be made in 1 to 2 weeks.   For quicker times please ask about rush orders.

SHIPPING
Rates and times are
- Canada= (Light Packet- takes 1-2 weeks)
- US & International(Light Packet- takes 1-2 weeks but can take longer for some countries).

options.name: Other size- please add note with order if you need a size not listed

name: Thicker Simple Circle Two Finger Ring
description:
Thicker Simple Circle Two Finger Ring

- A simple, classic and modern unisex two finger ring. This one is a thicker version of my other two finger rings. Thick enough to be sturdy but still elegant. Great worn on the index and middle fingers! 
- Thickness is 2 mm (12 guage) sterling silver.

Sizes
- Can be made in sizes 4-15- including half sizes. (So pretty much any size.)

Completion Times- can be finished in a few days to a week.

SHIPPING rates and times are
Free 'regular' unisured shipping.   For an upgrade to insured please ask. 
- Canada= (Reg Mail- takes 1-2 weeks)
- US & International(Light Packet- takes 1-2 weeks but can take longer for some countries)

options.name: Other- please include size with paypal payment
